600ecd69-52ff-44fd-b69a-3c21881cbb40.body: This flow demonstrates a simple customer satisfaction survey that rewards completers with a unique coupon generated by a webhook.
600ecd69-52ff-44fd-b69a-3c21881cbb40.title: Customer Survey

actions.text: Hi @contact.name! You've been selected to partake in a quick five question survey about your experience at the ThriftShop. As a thanks for participating you'll receive a 5% discount on your next visit.  Do you want to participate?
No problem, we understand you must be busy, thank you for your time!
Great! Don't worry, this will be quick. On a scale of 1-5, with 1 being not likely and 5 being very likely, how likely would you be to shop with us again?
Sorry, I didn't understand that. From 1-5, with 5 best most likely, how likely are you to shop with us again?

I'm sorry to hear that, we are always trying to improve and that is why we appreciate your time today. On a scale of 1-5, with 5 being most likely, how likely would you be to recommend us to a friend?

Thanks, it is great to hear we did a good job. Rest assured we still strive to improve every single day. Ok, so on a scale 1-5, with 5 being most likely, how likely would you be to recommend us to a friend?
Sorry I didn't understand that, please answer with 1-5. With 5 being most likely, how likely would you be to recommend us to a friend?
Well clearly we have to do better! What could we do to improve our services and have you recommend us more highly to a friend?
That is always nice to hear, thanks, but I'm sure we could do even better, what could we do to improve?
Ok, thanks, we'll definitely consider that.  Ok, two last questions and then you're all done, are you male or female?
I'm sorry, I didn't understand that! We're almost done though so let's try again.  Are you male or female?
Great, one last question, and don't worry we promise not to tell anyone else.  How old are you?
I know, I know, nobody likes to think about their age, but we promise not to share it with anyone else. Come on, how old are you?

actions.body:
@(json(object(
  "contact", object("uuid", contact.uuid, "name", contact.name, "urn", contact.urn),
  "flow", run.flow,
  "path", run.path,
  "results", foreach_value(results, extract_object, "category", "category_localized", "created_on", "input", "name", "node_uuid", "value"),
  "run", object("uuid", run.uuid, "created_on", run.created_on),
  "input", if(
    input,
    object(
      "attachments", foreach(input.attachments, attachment_parts),
      "channel", input.channel,
      "created_on", input.created_on,
      "text", input.text,
      "type", input.type,
      "urn", if(
        input.urn,
        object(
          "display", default(format_urn(input.urn), ""),
          "path", urn_parts(input.urn).path,
          "scheme", urn_parts(input.urn).scheme
        ),
        null
      ),
      "uuid", input.uuid
    ),
    null
  ),
  "channel", default(input.channel, null)
)))

actions.text: Thanks you so much for your time! Your coupon code is "@webhook.coupon", which you can use at any of our stores. Have a great day.

actions.body:
A new survey was just completed by @contact (@(format_urn(urns.tel))).

Shop Again: @results.shop_again  
Recommend: @results.recommend 
Suggestion: "@results.suggestion"

Survey completed by @results.age year old @results.gender.category_localized at @results.gender.created_on.
actions.subject: New Survey Completion

7c5215c0-1bf3-4e86-af8c-a99d7f5363b6.body: This single question poll demonstrates how a Flow can easily help measure what is happening in the field.
7c5215c0-1bf3-4e86-af8c-a99d7f5363b6.title: Simple Poll

actions.text: Hi @contact.name, is your water filter working?  Answer with Yes or No.
I'm sorry, I didn't understand that. Is your water filter still working?  Answer with Yes or No.
Great to hear, Thanks for your time!
Sorry to hear that, someone will be in touch to help you with your filter.

0bec6396-a9b6-4326-98be-3814b6a1e511.body:
This flow demonstrates looking up an order using a webhook and giving the user different options based on the results.  After looking up the order the user has the option to send additional comments which are forwarded to customer support representatives.

Use order numbers CU001, CU002 or CU003 to see the different cases in action.
0bec6396-a9b6-4326-98be-3814b6a1e511.title: Using Your Own Data

actions.text: Thanks for contacting the ThriftShop order status system. Please send your order # and we'll help you in a jiffy!
Sorry that doesn't look like a valid order number.  Maybe try: CU001, CU002 or CU003?

actions.body:
@(json(object(
  "contact", object("uuid", contact.uuid, "name", contact.name, "urn", contact.urn),
  "flow", run.flow,
  "path", run.path,
  "results", foreach_value(results, extract_object, "category", "category_localized", "created_on", "input", "name", "node_uuid", "value"),
  "run", object("uuid", run.uuid, "created_on", run.created_on),
  "input", if(
    input,
    object(
      "attachments", foreach(input.attachments, attachment_parts),
      "channel", input.channel,
      "created_on", input.created_on,
      "text", input.text,
      "type", input.type,
      "urn", if(
        input.urn,
        object(
          "display", default(format_urn(input.urn), ""),
          "path", urn_parts(input.urn).path,
          "scheme", urn_parts(input.urn).scheme
        ),
        null
      ),
      "uuid", input.uuid
    ),
    null
  ),
  "channel", default(input.channel, null)
)))

actions.text: Great news @webhook.name! We shipped your order for @webhook.description on @webhook.ship_date and we expect it will be delivered on @webhook.delivery_date. If you have any questions, just reply and our customer service department will be notified.

Hi @webhook.name.  Hope you are patient because we haven't shipped your order for @webhook.description yet.  We expect to ship it by @webhook.ship_date though. If you have any questions, just reply and our customer service department will be notified.

Uh oh @webhook.name!  Our record indicate that your order for @webhook.description was cancelled on @webhook.cancel_date. If you think this is in error, please reply with a comment and our orders department will get right on it!
Thanks @results.order_name, we'll be in touch ASAP about order # @results.order_number

actions.body:
Customer @results.order_name has a problem with their order @results.order_number for @results.order_description.  Please look into it ASAP and call them back with the status.
 
Customer Comment: "@results.comment"
Customer Name: @results.order_name
Customer Phone: @(format_urn(urns.tel))
actions.subject: Order Comment: @results.lookup: @results.order_number

6583d6ec-eacf-45ae-bfc0-37987deaac32.title: Envie uma mensagem
6583d6ec-eacf-45ae-bfc0-37987deaac32.body:
Esse é um card de enviar mensagem, toda vez que você quiser se comunicar com o usuário, será através desse card. Para saber mais sobre cards de ação, leia a documentação: 

https://docs.weni.ai/l/pt/fluxos/cartas-de-acao

fa12335c-601f-4ec3-b1c2-b1649c6dc84b.title: Aguarde uma mensagem
fa12335c-601f-4ec3-b1c2-b1649c6dc84b.body:
Esse card é feito para quando você espera uma mensagem de um contato, nele você pode configurar os caminhos que o chatbot seguirá a partir das respostas.
Saiba mais sobre o card de aguardar mensagem nessa documentação:

https://docs.weni.ai/l/pt/fluxos/cartas-de-decisao

154a4d84-aa97-44b7-a2ca-2a74b5753101.title: Respostas rápidas
154a4d84-aa97-44b7-a2ca-2a74b5753101.body:
Nesse card de enviar resposta existem o que chamamos de "quick replies", com eles você pode criar respostas rápidas em formado de botão
No exemplo temos dois, um de sim e um de não.
O seu usuário apertará um botão para responder.

151dfd49-717b-45f4-bb71-18bf26b61fba.title: Caminhos do chatbot
151dfd49-717b-45f4-bb71-18bf26b61fba.body: Normalmente chamamos esses caminhos representados pelas setas de ""Ligações" , pois ligam o caminho que o chatbot fará. Para fazer essa ligação é necessário apenas ligar um card ao outro e ir montando o fluxo de mensagens

146dbd2e-bea6-4414-adef-d9fea7e03627.title: Saiba mais sobre como criar um fluxo completo
146dbd2e-bea6-4414-adef-d9fea7e03627.body:
Agora que demos uma pequena introdução sobre as principais funcionalidades aqui, você pode descobrir mais conceitos para construir um fluxo de mensagens do jeitinho que você quiser.
Para saber mais é só ler a documentação:

https://docs.weni.ai/l/pt/fluxos/introducao-a-fluxos

https://docs.weni.ai/l/pt/fluxos/editor-de-fluxo-e-suas-ferramentas

710c0981-5c38-4263-9a5d-320ce13e20b5.title: Salvar resultado
710c0981-5c38-4263-9a5d-320ce13e20b5.body: Para motivos de organização e comunicação entre os outros cards, você pode salvar as respostas dos contatos como um resultado.

383bb42c-1132-408c-ad3e-234fcad52a41.title: Adicione uma inteligência
383bb42c-1132-408c-ad3e-234fcad52a41.body:
Ao aguardar uma resposta de um contato é muito recomendado adicionar uma inteligência artificial para ajudar a tratar as respostas de uma forma mais confiável e assertiva.
Para saber mais como adicionar uma inteligência acesse: https://docs.weni.ai/l/pt/fluxos/split-by-intent

a4d00990-258f-4638-bcaf-8e51d9c44d8f.title: Glossário de expressões
a4d00990-258f-4638-bcaf-8e51d9c44d8f.body:
O módulo de fluxos também funciona com expressões, você pode digitar @result e selecionar um resultado que você salvou, por exemplo.
Para saber mais sobre essas expressões que facilitam a utilização do módulo acesse:

https://docs.weni.ai/l/pt/fluxos/introdu-o-de-express-es-e-vari-veis

https://docs.weni.ai/l/pt/fluxos/gloss-rio-de-vari-veis

https://docs.weni.ai/l/pt/fluxos/express-es

913a6ae0-76ca-465c-9630-2d124360246a.title: Vídeo "Meu primeiro fluxo"
913a6ae0-76ca-465c-9630-2d124360246a.body:
Se você prefere aprender por vídeo, se liga nesse que criamos explicando passo a passo sobre como criar o seu primeiro fluxo. Esperamos que ajude :) 

https://dash.weni.ai/academy/module/1/category/1/class/13

flows.name: Abra para aprender a construir seu primeiro fluxo

actions.text:
Olá, seja bem vindo(a)! 😄
Você gostaria de conhecer mais sobre a nossa empresa?
Ótimo!🎉 Você pode acessar nosso site para ter acesso ao nosso catálogo de produtos.

Tudo bem! Agradecemos pela sua atenção.
Você pode voltar a qualquer momento quando estiver pronto(a).
Nos vemos em breve👋
